remedies.title: Headache Relief
remedies.description: Common headache remedies and when to seek medical help
remedies: Rest in a quiet, dark room
Apply cold or warm compress to head
Stay hydrated - drink plenty of water
Try gentle neck and shoulder massage
remedies.warning: Consult doctor if headache persists for more than 24 hours
remedies.audioText: For headache relief, rest in a quiet dark room, apply cold compress, drink plenty of water, and try gentle massage. See a doctor if pain persists.

remedies.title: Fever Management
remedies.warning: Seek immediate medical help if fever exceeds 102Â°F or persists for 3+ days
remedies.audioText: For fever, take paracetamol, use cold sponging, drink fluids, and rest. See doctor immediately if fever is very high or continues for days.

remedies.title: Cough Relief
remedies: Drink warm water with honey and lemon
remedies.warning: Consult doctor if cough persists for more than 2 weeks or has blood
remedies.audioText: For cough, drink honey lemon water, gargle with salt water, take steam, and stay warm. See doctor if cough continues or has blood.

remedies.title: Stomach Pain Relief
remedies.description: Common remedies for mild stomach discomfort
remedies: Drink warm water or herbal tea
remedies.warning: Seek immediate help for severe pain, vomiting, or signs of infection
remedies.audioText: For stomach pain, drink warm water, apply heat, eat simple foods like rice and banana. See doctor immediately for severe pain or vomiting.
